mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(n.dateStr,' ',n.client_id) dateStr,num FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.create_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS dateStr,t.client_id, COUNT(*) AS num FROM pay_order t WHERE create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime} AND t.client_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY dateStr,t.client_id ORDER BY dateStr)n

SELECT CONCAT(n.dateStr,' ',n.client_id) dateStr,num FROM( SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(t.create_datetime,'%Y'),'/', LPAD(WEEKOFYEAR(t.create_datetime),2,0),'周') AS dateStr,t.client_id, COUNT(*) AS num FROM pay_order t WHERE create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime} AND t.client_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY dateStr,t.client_id ORDER BY dateStr)n

SELECT CONCAT(n.dateStr,' ',n.client_id) dateStr,num FROM( SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(t.create_datetime,'%Y/%m'),'月') AS dateStr,t.client_id, COUNT(*) AS num FROM pay_order t WHERE create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime} AND t.client_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY dateStr,t.client_id ORDER BY dateStr)n

SELECT n.num ,c.name AS dateStr FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) as num,cus_province FROM pay_order WHERE create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime} GROUP BY cus_province ORDER BY cus_province)n ,train_city c WHERE n.cus_province = c.id
SELECT COUNT(*) as num,CONCAT(cus_province,' ',cus_city,' ',cus_area) AS dateStr FROM pay_order WHERE create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime} GROUP BY dateStr ORDER BY dateStr
